breakthroughPP.player

Class AbstractPlayer

  • java.lang.Object
    • breakthroughPP.player.AbstractPlayer
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    Player, java.rmi.Remote
    Direct Known Subclasses:
    AbstractAI, HumanPlayer

    public abstract class AbstractPlayer
extends java.lang.Object
implements Player
    Class AbstractPlayer player that implements the basic functionality of a player based on the interface Player
    Author:
    Max Pesch
